DOC.brief_summary: A double-masked , parallel study AR-12286 Ophthalmic Solution 0.5 % , 0.7 % ( q.d. , PM ) timolol maleate Ophthalmic Solution , 0.5 % ( b.i.d . ) , O.U . 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assessing Safety Ocular Hypotensive Efficacy AR-12286 Patients With Elevated Intraocular Pressure 3 Months
